name: Adrakadoo
description:
This game was made for the GamesPlusJam 3.

It's a lil wizard on a snowboard.

Controls:

Press A - Shoot Fireball: Destroy the trees!
Press S - Electric shock: Deactivate lazer
Hold D - Frost: Freeze cold water

Esc OR alt + f4 - Quit game: I don't blame you.

Music by: Mickey
